name: Oven Ready Deal
description:
Made for GGJ 2021!

Help Boris Johnson find his 'Oven Ready Deal' before the Brexit deadline! Left click to move, right click and drag to rotate the camera. Walk into objects to search under them. Once you have the 'Oven Ready Deal', quickly pop it in the microwave!

Credits: 

Joe Merricks - 3D, Design, Code (https://joemerix.itch.io/)

Theo Tsangaris - Code (https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=TheoTGames)

Adam Hitchen - Code (https://dangermau5.itch.io/)
